set(INC
	include
)

set(INC_SYS

)

set(SRC
	binreloc.c

	include/binreloc.h
)

add_definitions(-DENABLE_BINRELOC)


blender_add_lib(extern_binreloc "${SRC}" "${INC}" "${INC_SYS}")
